snippet: Although the United States national basketball team overcame a shaky start for a win in front of President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., there were signs of weakness in the middle.
abstract: United States Olympic team beats the Brazil, 80-69, in an exhibition game.
lead_paragraph: Although the United States national basketball team overcame a shaky start for a win in front of President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., there were signs of weakness in the middle.

headline.seo: United States National Basketball Team Defeats Brazil, 80-69
headline.main: U.S. Gets Past Brazil but Struggles Down Low
headline.print_headline: U.S. Gets Past Brazil But Struggles Down Low
